javadoc: MenuHandler provides a listener interface for menus. This interface has been provided to allow the listener to manage focus and help behavior.

methods.name: processMenuAction
methods.comment: Invoked when a menu action item is selected.

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when the mouse highlights a menu item.
@param action associated action.
methods.name: menuItemEntered
methods.comment: Invoked when the mouse highlights a menu item.

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when the mouse exits a menu item.
@param action associated action.
methods.name: menuItemExited
methods.comment: Invoked when the mouse exits a menu item.

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when a menu is cancelled (not sure if this is ever invoked)
@see javax.swing.event.MenuListener#menuCanceled(javax.swing.event.MenuEvent)
methods.name: menuCanceled
methods.comment: Invoked when a menu is cancelled (not sure if this is ever invoked)

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when a menu is no longer selected.  This is always preceeded
 by a menuSelected invocation.  This is invoked prior to the processMenuAction 
 if an action item is selected.
@see javax.swing.event.MenuListener#menuDeselected(javax.swing.event.MenuEvent)
methods.name: menuDeselected
methods.comment:
Invoked when a menu is no longer selected.  This is always preceeded
 by a menuSelected invocation.  This is invoked prior to the processMenuAction 
 if an action item is selected.

methods.javadoc:
Invoked when a menu is selected.
@see javax.swing.event.MenuListener#menuSelected(javax.swing.event.MenuEvent)
methods.name: menuSelected
methods.comment: Invoked when a menu is selected.

methods.javadoc:
This method is called before the popup menu becomes visible
@see javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener#popupMenuWillBecomeVisible(javax.swing.event.PopupMenuEvent)
methods.name: popupMenuWillBecomeVisible
methods.comment: This method is called before the popup menu becomes visible

methods.name: popupMenuWillBecomeInvisible
methods.comment:
This method is called before the popup menu becomes invisible
 Note that a JPopupMenu can become invisible any time

methods.javadoc:
This method is called when the popup menu is canceled
@see javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener#popupMenuCanceled(javax.swing.event.PopupMenuEvent)
methods.name: popupMenuCanceled
methods.comment: This method is called when the popup menu is canceled

name: MenuHandler
comment:
MenuHandler provides a listener interface for menus.
 This interface has been provided to allow the listener to
 manage focus and help behavior.
